header: A Prophecy Against the King of Tyre

verse: A message from the Lord came to me. The Lord said,
“Son of man, speak to Ethbaal. He is the ruler of Tyre. Tell him, ‘The Lord and King says,
A message from the Lord came to me. The Lord said,
“Son of man, sing a song of sadness about the king of Tyre. Tell him, ‘The Lord and King says,
A message from the Lord came to me. The Lord said,
“Son of man, turn your attention to the city of Sidon. Prophesy against it.
“ ‘ “The people of Israel will no longer have neighbors who hate them. Those neighbors will not be like sharp and painful thorns anymore. Then Israel will know that I am the Lord and King.” ’ ”

The Lord and King says, “I will gather the people of Israel together from the nations where they have been scattered. That will prove that I am holy. I will let the nations see it. Then Israel will live in their own land. I gave it to my servant Jacob.

My people will live there in safety. They will build houses. They will plant vineyards. They will live in safety. I will punish all their neighbors who told lies about them. Then Israel will know that I am the Lord their God.”
